intro: Oreocharis longifolia, commonly known as the long-leaved oreocharis, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are typically small and clustered, with a delicate appearance. Oreocharis longifolia is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and mountainous regions.
